OrgName.entry: NORTON ASSOCIATION FOR THE PROSECUTION OF FELONS AND OTHER DEPREDATORS

Desc.entry: Association for men only which maintains the old traditions and links with the local police force by dining together in Norton on the Wednesday nearest the first full moon in March. Holds an autumn social in October-November (ladies invited) and an annual dinner.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Autumn supper, AGM and committee meetings - please contact for details
Dinner in March - please contact for details
